name: Mr. Reputation
description:
Mr. Reputation is a resource management card game with you, Mr. Reputation, at the heart of the criminal operation.

Allocate your resources to increase your odds of getting a return in a given scenario. You don't have long to decide as the world of crime is always changing. Also, try to stay off police radar.

You must have at least one of each coloured resource to not skip your turn and take part in the scenario. The more resources, the higher the chances of success, but also the more the police suspect something is up.

Have fun and figure the rest out! There will be updates to make gameplay feel less unfair at times.
